thread.title: Barcelona want Jorge Sampaoli to replace Luis Enrique if Ronald Koeman doesn’t want to become their new manager
thread.title_full: Barcelona want Jorge Sampaoli to replace Luis Enrique if Ronald Koeman doesn’t want to become their new manager

author: ashilton
title: Barcelona want Jorge Sampaoli to replace Luis Enrique if Ronald Koeman doesn’t want to become their new manager
text:
The Sevilla boss has guided his team to third in La Liga Getty Images Everton boss Ronald Koeman is also on the Blaugrana’s shortlist Barcelona boss Luis Enrique restrained by THREE people as he lashes out at reporter Getty Images Former Chile boss Sampaoli is certainly not short on passion Getty Images 7 Dutch defender Koeman spent six seasons playing for Barcelona 
He then signed a two-year deal at Sevilla to take over from Unai Emery - ironically the man who may have delivered the fatal blow to Enrique's stay in charge of the current Spanish champions. 
Sevilla, who have won the Europa League three times in a row, are set to improve upon Emery's seventh-place finish from last season. Related stories ENRIQUE MELTDOWN Barcelona boss Luis Enrique restrained by THREE people as he lashes out at reporter after PSG horror show it ain't over As Arsenal look for a miracle against Bayern Munich, we offer inspiration with a look at the best Champions League comebacks NOU KOE BID Everton will fight to keep Ronald Koeman with Barca old boy a contender to replace Luis Enrique A NOU ERA Battered Barcelona need a massive shake-up and Luis Enrique's exit is inevitable, says Gerry Armstrong Time for a Nou boss? As Luis Enrique edges towards Barca sack, five bosses who could take over Euro trash Barcelona's seven worst European nights following 4-0 drubbing at the hands of PSG 
'Los Blanquirrojos' sit just two points back from second-place Barca in La Liga, with Real Madrid a point further clear and with two games in hand. 
And Sampaoli, who won the Copa America during his three years in charge of Chile, has left the door open to an exit from the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. AP:Associated Press Former Sevilla boss Unai Emery masterminded PSG's 4-0 win over Barca EPA 7 Enrique later lost the plot with a journalist after the full-time whistle 
When asked about the Barca job earlier this month, he said: "It's speculation, rumours. Luis Enrique is a winner, he is respected and loved by the fans there. 
"If he leaves, there will an enormous list of candidates. I see it very far away although the good moment of Sevilla means that people look at their coach. Nothing more. 
"I don't know [if I will stay another season at Sevilla]. You never know. I'm happy here, I fight for things, I have synergy with the sporting director." Angel Di Maria and Edinson Cavani celebrate their birthdays after PSG beat Barcelona 4-0
